name: ROOD - An old shooter (Alpha 0.1)
description:
ROOD is a DOOM Launcher who can generate maps , load .wads maps , play multiplayer (with the help of Chocolate Doom) it is in really early dev so report any bugs .

Warning

 WE HAVE NOTHING WITH DOOM , CHOCOLATE DOOM , ZENNODE AND EVERYTHING THAT ROOD CONTAINTS  . KEEP IN MIND THAT WE WORK ALONE read readme.txt for more info
